<html>
  <!-- autogenerated file on ${__DATE__} by ${__USER__} -->
  <head>
    <title>All ${models}</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    
    <a href="<?= URL::create('${model}', 'anew');?>">Add a new ${Model}</a><p><hr size=3 /></p>
  
    <? foreach ($${models} AS $${model}): ?>

        <a href="<?= URL::create('${model}', 'edit', array('id'=>$${model}->${__PK__}));?>">Edit</a>
        <a href="<?= URL::create('${model}', 'delete', array('id'=>$${model}->${__PK__}));?>">Distroy</a>
        
        ${__BUFFER__}
        
        <p><hr size=3 /></p>
    <? endforeach; ?>
    
    <a href="<?= URL::create('${model}', 'anew');?>">Add a new ${Model}</a>
    
  </body>
</html>
